dcterms:description: The WMT14 English-German translation task is a benchmark for evaluating machine translation systems, providing a dataset of sentence pairs for training and testing.

dcterms:description: The CNN/Daily Mail dataset is used for training models on document summarization tasks, consisting of news articles paired with multi-sentence summaries.
